content: Yes -- what happened was that the nng rw is a modified rw, but I didn't also modify other related tactics, so rwa behaves like it would do in Lean. In case you're wondering why I modified rw, experiments with undergraduates showed me that if you didn't modify it then Lean would randomly close goals "early" because of definitional equalities, and so I had to choose to either explain the concept of definitional equality or to make it go away, and I chose to do the latter.
That sounds reasonable. I find it clearer also.
Joseph O has marked this topic as resolved.
